name: @folio/stripes-react-hotkeys
description: Stripes' hotkey library based on react-hotkeys.

scripts.test: npm run clean-test && cross-env BABEL_ENV=test RTL_SKIP_AUTO_CLEANUP=true karma start
scripts.prepublish: npm run build-cjs && npm run build-es && npm run build-umd
scripts.build-cjs: rm -rf cjs && npm run build-development && npm run build-production
scripts.build-es: rm -rf es && npm run build-es-development && npm run build-es-production
scripts.build-umd: rm -rf umd && npm run build-umd-development && npm run build-umd-production
scripts.build-development: cross-env BABEL_ENV=development NODE_ENV=development babel lib -d cjs
scripts.build-es-development: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es-development NODE_ENV=development babel lib -d es
scripts.build-umd-development: cross-env BABEL_ENV=umd-development NODE_ENV=development rollup --format umd --name ReactHotkeys -c --file umd/react-hotkeys.js
scripts.build-production: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production rollup --format cjs -c --file cjs/react-hotkeys.production.min.js
scripts.build-es-production: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es-production NODE_ENV=production rollup --format es -c --file es/react-hotkeys.production.min.js
scripts.build-umd-production: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production rollup --format umd --name ReactHotkeys -c --file umd/react-hotkeys.min.js
